text: How can you get tickets to the 2017 iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour, you ask? If you're a Capital One cardholder, you'll be first to get access to high demand tickets through a special iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Capital One Cardholder Pre - Sale in each city. The iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Capital One Cardholder Pre - Sale begins October 11th at 10am local market time and runs through October 14th at 10am local market time or while supplies last. Tickets will be available at www. iHeartRadio. com / CapitalOne. All other tickets go on sale to the general public on October 16th at 12pm local market time, and will be available at www. iHeartRadi
